articles.title: Months after this 'serious' cyberattack, stolen data has been leaked online by hackers - ZDNet

articles.content:
Data stolen in a cyberattack against a London council last year has been leaked online by the hackers responsible for the attack.

articles.title: B&M's kind gesture to staff as a way of saying thank you for working through pandemic - Belfast Live
articles.description: It is classed as an essential retailer and has been open throughout the various lockdowns and Tier regulations
articles.content:
B&M is giving 30,000 of its shop floor staff an extra week's wages as a thank you for their hard work during the pandemic.
